name: The Letter: Seeker Of Truths (hammergamesb)
description:
The Letter: Seeker Of Truths is a story driven stealth/3Dplatformer game with a beautiful low poly graphic.

Story

The game is about a reporter who seeking truth about origin of war and terrorism in our world.

Game Features

  • Beautiful low poly style graphic
  • Strong female protagonist
  • Fun and exciting stealth gameplay
  • Easy to pick up and play
  • Entertaining story with strong messag
